text: Okwenziwe kwavumeleka kuni namhlanje kokulungileyo. Ukutya kwaBantu beNcwadi4 kuvumelekile kuni kanti nokwenukuvumelekilekubo.(Okuvumelekeleumtshatokuni) ngabasetyhini abanyulu kumakholwakazi (amaMuslimkazi) nabanyulu kwabo babenikwe isiBhalo ngaphambili kunani (amaYuda namaKhristu) enibanike imahr yabo, ninqwenela ubunyulu ningafuni kwenza lukrexezo ningafuni kubenza (amankazana). Lowo ungalwamkeliyo ukholo izenzo zakhe aziyi kuba naziqhamo, Yaye kuBomi oBuzayo uya kuba ngomnye wabalahlekelwa
